New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers won 129-122, snapping Oklahoma City Thunder's 15-game winning streak; Cavaliers improve to 32-4, best record in NBA; Thunder drop to 30-6
Key Match Events: Neither team led by double digits; Cavaliers won critical possession challenge with 1:19 left; Thunder's aggressive defense exploitable via corner 3-pointers; Cavaliers' offensive rebounds in final minutes crucial
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder's loss due to defensive approach and Cavaliers' efficient shooting; Cavaliers' balanced attack and role players' contributions highlighted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thunder's defense beatable by corner 3s; Chet Holmgren's potential return significant; Thunder may need to add a creator at trade deadline
